protocol.name: Affymetrix:Protocol:Hybridization-Unknown
protocol.text: Affymetrix Generic Hybridization

protocol.name: P-AFFY-6
protocol.text: Title: Affymetrix CEL analysis. Description:

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol -> pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h green light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: 4h of complete darkness (dark control)

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: continuous far-red light / time course: 45 min continuous far-red light / light intensity: 10 umol m-2 s-1 / filter: 715 nm DAL interference filter (Schott, Mainz, Germany), lamba(max) = 715 nm, half-bandwidth = 15 nm / light source: Leitz Prado 500-W universal projector (Leitz, Wetzlar, Germany) together with Osram Xenophot longlife lamps (Osram, Berlin, Germany) / Temperature: 22degreeC

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: red light pulse / time course: 1 min red light pulse followed by 44 min of darkness / light intensity: 50 umol m-2 s-1 / filter: KG65 double glas filter (Balzers, Liechtenstein), lamba(max) = 650 nm, half-bandwidth = 15 nm / light source: Leitz Prado 500-W universal projector (Leitz, Wetzlar, Germany) together with Osram Xenophot longlife lamps (Osram, Berlin, Germany) / Temperature: 22degreeC

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degreeC, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: light treatment: continuous red light / time course: 45 min continuous red light / light intensity: 10 umol m-2 s-1 / filter: KG65 double glas filter (Balzers, Liechtenstein), lamba(max) = 650 nm, half-bandwidth = 15 nm / light source: Leitz Prado 500-W universal projector (Leitz, Wetzlar, Germany) together with Osram Xenophot longlife lamps (Osram, Berlin, Germany) / Temperature: 22degreeC

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: continuous blue light / time course: 45 min continuous blue light / light intensity: 10 umol m-2 s-1 / filter: 453 nm DAL interference filter (Schott, Mainz, Germany), lamba(max) = 453 nm, half-bandwidth = 18 nm / light source: Leitz Prado 500-W universal projector (Leitz, Wetzlar, Germany) together with Osram Xenophot longlife lamps (Osram, Berlin, Germany) / Temperature: 22degreeC

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: UV-A light pulse / time course: 5 min UV-A light pulse followed by 40 min of darkness / light intensity: 7 W m-2 / filter: WG327 quarz filter, 3 mm, (Schott, Mainz, Germany), cut-off filter with half-maximal transmission at 327 nm / light source: 6 x Philips TL 40W/12 UV fluorescent tubes, lamba(max) = 310 nm, half-bandwidth = 40 nm / Temperature: 22degreeC / literature: PMID 14739338

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degreeC, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: continuous white light / time course: 45 min continuous white light / light intensity: 10 umol m-2 s-1 / filter: 10 % neutral glas filter (Balzers, Liechtenstein) / light source: Leitz Prado 500-W universal projector (Leitz, Wetzlar, Germany) together with Osram Xenophot longlife lamps (Osram, Berlin, Germany) / Temperature: 22degreeC

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: continuous white light / time course: 4 h continuous white light / light intensity: 10 umol m-2 s-1 / filter: 10 % neutral glas filter (Balzers, Liechtenstein) / light source: Leitz Prado 500-W universal projector (Leitz, Wetzlar, Germany) together with Osram Xenophot longlife lamps (Osram, Berlin, Germany) / Temperature: 22degreeC

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: 45 min of complete darkness (dark control)

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg Sterilization: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short zentrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on steril filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: UV-A/B light pulse / time course: 5 min UV-A/B light pulse followed by 40 min of darkness Light intensity: 7 W m-2 / filter: WG307 quarz filter, 3 mm, (Schott, Mainz, Germany), cut-off filter with half-maximal transmission at 307 nm Light source: 6 x Philips TL 40W/12 UV fluorescent tubes, lamba(max) = 310 nm, half-bandwidth = 40 nm Temperature: 22degreeC Literature: PMID 14739338

Treatment before light irradiation: Amount of dry seeds: 18 mg / sterilisation: 3 min 70 % Ethanol, stir with over-head tumbler -> short centrifugation ->resuspend in 100 % Ethanol ->pipette on sterile filter paper ->air dry in a sterile bench / Growth media: MS agar (1.2 %) covered with a sterile filter paper (Schleicher and Schuell, Rundfilter 595, Dassel, Germany) in petridishes / Stratification: 8degree C, 48 h / Germination induction: 2 h red light / Growth: 94 h in complete darkness at 22degreeC before onset of irradiation Light treatment: 4h of complete darkness (dark control)
